bibl.title: Sarapis-proskynema in the Light of SB III 6263.
bibl.note: P. Lond. Inv. 2102 (= S.B. III, 6263). - "A Sarapis-proskynema should not be connected, not only with the city of Alexandria, but even with any of god's temples in the land of Egypt".

bibl.title: Actes du XVe Congrès International de Papyrologie. IV

bibl.seg: Farid Farouk, Sarapis-proskynema in the Light of SB III 6263.
Actes du XVe Congrès International de Papyrologie. IV (Bruxelles, 1979) pp. 141-147.
P. Lond. Inv. 2102 (= S.B. III, 6263). - "A Sarapis-proskynema should not be connected, not only with the city of Alexandria, but even with any of god's temples in the land of Egypt".
